item.title: A Different Gospel - Galatians 1:1-10 | #S1-547 | 9/4/2011 | Sunday
item.description: This morning, Pastor Brett gives us an introduction to the book of Galatians. We see an old testament picture in I Kings 13 of a new testament truth.
item.author: Brett Meador
item.keywords: altars, Rehaboam, Jeroboam, prophecy, apostle, grace, false prophets, resurrection

item.title: Through the Bible Study - 2 Corinthians 12-13 | #M1-564 | 8/31/2011 | Wednesday
item.description: As we wrap up the book of II Corinthians, we see Paul explaining to the church at Corinth that the way they are choosing to behave is wrong. As a result, the Corinthians rejected his corrections. We learn the importance of being receptive of the Word of God.
item.author: Brett Meador
item.keywords: correction, Heaven, self-pity, grace, discipline, perfection, kiss, holy kiss

item.title: Paul's Thorn in the Flesh - 2 Corinthians 12:7-10 | #S1-546 | 8/28/2011 | Sunday
item.description: Today, Pastor Brett takes a closer look at II Corinthians 12: 7-10. He explains how God’s power is best displayed when we go through trials and tribulations.
item.author: Brett Meador
item.keywords: knowledge, credentials, thorn, demon possession, demons, pride, thorn in my flesh, flesh, prayer, trials

item.title: Through the Bible Study - 2 Corinthians 10-11 | #M1-563 | 8/24/2011 | Wednesday
item.description: In II Corinthians 10 and 11, we see Paul continue to admonish the church at Corinth for their deeds. Pastor Brett discusses how the modern day church should respond to Paul’s words.
item.author: Brett Meador
item.keywords: spanking, punishment, discipline, meekness, armor of God, armor, prayer, thoughts, obedience, accountability, authority

item.title: Outward Appearance? - 2 Corinthians 10:7-12 | #S1-545 | 8/21/2011 | Sunday
item.description: Today, Pastor Brett explains the importance of not judging people by their outward appearance. We see a prime example of that mistake being made by Goliath before he fought David in II Samuel 17.
item.author: Brett Meador
item.keywords: appearances, David, Goliath, criticism, judging, heart, restoration, critical

item.title: Through the Bible Study - 2 Corinthians 9 | #M1-562 | 8/17/2011 | Wednesday
item.description: Tonight, we see Paul continue to build the Corinthians up in the Lord. Pastor Brett discusses how this relates to the church today.
item.author: Brett Meador

item.title: God's Unspeakable Gift - 2 Corinthians 9:15 | #S1-544 | 8/14/2011 | Sunday
item.description: In II Corinthians 9:15, Paul takes a moment to celebrate what Jesus Christ has done for all of us. We look at all of the aspects of this gift, and all of its glory.
item.author: Brett Meador
item.keywords: gift, giving, sin, salvation, God’s gift, justification, forgiveness

item.title: Through the Bible Study - 2 Corinthians 8 | #M1-561 | 8/10/2011 | Wednesday
item.description: In II Corinthians 8, Paul begins to teach the church about giving. Pastor Brett discusses the difference between “giving” and “tithe”.
item.author: Brett Meador
item.keywords: giving, tithing, tithe, enthusiasm, promises, credit

item.title: Guest Speaker: Bobby Belt - Psalm 19:7-11 | #G-171 | 8/7/2011 | Sunday
item.description: Pastor Bobby shares a teaching about the Word. David’s Psalm has much to teach us about the deep riches of God’s Word and the many ways it benefits us as we spend time studying.
item.author: Brett Meador

item.title: Guest Speaker: Jeff Young - Mark 2:27-3:6 | #G-170 | 8/3/2011 | Wednesday
item.description: Pastor Jeff takes us through this great story of Jesus healing a man. We take some time to examine the people who were there – the Pharisees, the man who was healed and Jesus Himself. This study offers a lot of practical application regarding our motivations and the decision we make.
item.author: Brett Meador

item.title: Just Do Something - 2 Corinthians 8:10-11 | #S1-543 | 7/31/2011 | Sunday
item.description: This morning, we continue our study through II Corinthians 8, where Paul talks to the Corinthians about what is good and expedient for them. Pastor Brett focuses on how to identify the problem, expose the after-effect, and offer the solution.
item.author: Brett Meador
item.keywords: repentance, expedience, sin, self-righteousness, Jeremiah, David

item.title: Through the Bible Study - 2 Corinthians 6-7 | #M1-560 | 7/27/2011 | Wednesday
item.description: Tonight, we continue our study through II Corinthians 6 and 7. Paul explains to the church that we as Christians, are to be ambassadors, representing Christ, in this dark world.
item.author: Brett Meador
item.keywords: Music, grace, salvation, school, seminary, pureness, depression, Naaman, leprosy

item.title: Repentance - 2 Corinthians 7:8-10 | #S1-542 | 7/24/2011 | Sunday
item.description: In II Corinthians 7:8-10, we study the difference between repentance and regret. Paul talks about what it meant for the church at Corinth to be truly sorry and repentant, versus being sorry only for a short while and reverting back to their old ways.
item.author: Brett Meador
item.keywords: regret, repentance, Saul, David, sorrow, sin, Peter, Judas
